pullrequest.title: Change train_windows (in minibatch) to sort in reverse, such that the last index will not be greater than 9999

content.raw:
This comprehension loops through the entire list instead of ending at the first instance where you find the window index you previous selected. Replace this with a for loop that breaks as soon as your match is found. Or replace with a more clever way to find it.

If you're going to be looping through all the windows perhaps you want to actually perform a comprehension where you filter out all the window indexes > 9999 and then randomly choose one of those windows. Whatever you think would make things clearer.
